hero.title: Elevate Your Online Presence with Nova
hero.description: We create stunning, high-performance websites that help your business stand out and convert visitors into customers.

features.title: Why Choose Nova
features.description: We combine cutting-edge technology with stunning design to deliver websites that perform.

customDesign.title: Custom Design
customDesign.description: Tailored websites designed to match your brand identity and business goals.

performance.title: Performance Focused
performance.description: Lightning-fast websites optimized for speed, SEO, and conversion.

security.title: Secure & Reliable
security.description: Built with security in mind, ensuring your website and data are protected.

support.title: Full Support
support.description: Ongoing maintenance and support to keep your website running smoothly.

portfolio.description: Explore our pre-designed templates that can be customized for your business.

portfolioTemplate.title: Portfolio

ecommerce.title: E-commerce

about.title: We're a New Design Studio
about.description: Founded with a passion for creating beautiful, functional websites that make an impact.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At Nova, we believe that every business deserves a stunning online presence. As a newly established design studio, we're focused on building strong relationships with our clients through personalized service and exceptional design.
mission.description2: We're not just another web design agency. We're your creative partners, dedicated to understanding your unique needs and crafting digital experiences that truly represent your brand and connect with your audience.

contact.title: Let's Discuss Your Project
contact.description: We're excited to hear about your ideas and how we can help bring them to life.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.description: Reach out to us directly or fill out the form to schedule a consultation.

footer.description: Creating beautiful, functional websites that help businesses succeed online.
